Projects

Loopo Android Player

Loopo is an audio player that lets you easily define bookmarks and play loops, change speed and pitch during playback. Discover how Loopo can be useful for music learning and for language learning!

Setlist for Android

Android Fragment Generator

There are many ways to create a fragment in Android.
This tools will help you find the right one.

Sono Digitale Podcast

Italian tech podcast, made by me and a friend of mine. We talk about tech news, upcoming devices, great apps and curious gadgets.
